data.event: The state expects to receive $267 million to insulate, seal and otherwise improve home energy efficiency for thousands of low-income Ohioans over the next three years.

event.title: received about $30 million in federal money for weatherization in 2008

data.event: Ohio received about $30 million in federal money for weatherization in 2008, so the stimulus money represents an increase of almost 800 percent.
